speaker: Maya
text: I reviewed the deployment pipeline logs, and there’s a step which regularly fails when load is high.
ipa: aɪ rɪˈvjuːd ðə dɪˈplɔɪmənt ˈpaɪplaɪn lɒɡz, ənd ðɛəz ə stɛp wɪʧ ˈrɛɡjʊləli feɪlz wen ləʊd ɪz haɪ.

speaker: Dylan
text: Is it the script that provisions new containers?
ipa: ɪz ɪt ðə skrɪpt ðæt prəˈvɪʒənz njuː kənˈteɪnəz?

speaker: Maya
text: Yes. The script which handles scaling relies on a legacy image that hasn’t been updated in months.
ipa: jɛs. ðə skrɪpt wɪʧ ˈhændlz ˈskeɪlɪŋ rɪˈlaɪz ɒn ə ˈlɛɡəsi ˈɪmɪdʒ ðæt ˈhæznt bɪn ʌpˈdeɪtɪd ɪn mʌnθs.

speaker: Dylan
text: That explains a lot. The Dockerfile that defines that image is the one which I meant to deprecate last quarter.
ipa: ðæt ɪksˈpleɪnz ə lɒt. ðə ˈdɒkəfaɪl ðæt dɪˈfaɪnz ðæt ˈɪmɪdʒ ɪz ðə wʌn wɪʧ aɪ mɛnt tuː ˈdɛprəkeɪt lɑːst ˈkwɔːtə.

speaker: Maya
text: Well, now’s the time. There’s a security issue which affects the base OS used in that image.
ipa: wɛl, naʊz ðə taɪm. ðɛəz ə sɪˈkjʊərɪti ˈɪʃuː wɪʧ əˈfɛkts ðə beɪs əʊˈɛs juːzd ɪn ðæt ˈɪmɪdʒ.

speaker: Dylan
text: I’ll coordinate with the security team, who already flagged it in last week's report.
ipa: aɪl kəʊˈɔːdɪneɪt wɪð ðə sɪˈkjʊərɪti tiːm, huː ɔːlˈrɛdi flæɡd ɪt ɪn lɑːst wiːks rɪˈpɔːt.

speaker: Maya
text: Good. The engineer whose job it is to maintain the CI/CD tooling is out this week, though.
ipa: ɡʊd. ði ˌɛnʤɪˈnɪə huːz ʤɒb ɪt ɪz tuː meɪnˈteɪn ðə siː-aɪ siː-diː ˈtuːlɪŋ ɪz aʊt ðɪs wiːk, ðəʊ.

speaker: Dylan
text: No worries — we’ll prepare a patch that he can review once he's back.
ipa: nəʊ ˈwʌriz — wiːl prɪˈpeə ə pæʧ ðæt hiː kən rɪˈvjuː wʌns hiːz bæk.

speaker: Maya
text: Also, we should document the behavior that led to the silent failure. It wasn’t obvious.
ipa: ˈɔːlsəʊ, wiː ʃʊd ˈdɒkjʊmənt ðə bɪˈheɪvjə ðæt lɛd tuː ðə ˈsaɪlənt ˈfeɪljə. ɪt ˈwɒznt ˈɒbvɪəs.

speaker: Dylan
text: Totally. Let's include a case study in the audit doc which explains the entire incident flow.
ipa: ˈtəʊtəli. lɛts ɪnˈkluːd ə keɪs ˈstʌdi ɪn ði ˈɔːdɪt dɒk wɪʧ ɪksˈpleɪnz ði ɪnˈtaɪə ˈɪnsɪdənt fləʊ.

speaker: Maya
text: Great idea. It'll help any new team members who join during the next rotation.
ipa: ɡreɪt aɪˈdɪə. ˈɪtl hɛlp ˈɛni njuː tiːm ˈmɛmbəz huː ʤɔɪn ˈdjʊərɪŋ ðə nɛkst rəʊˈteɪʃən.
